00036   int lineno;
00037   union {
00038     struct {struct VERSST *version; struct NAMEST *name; struct DECL_LIST *decl_list; struct STATE_LIST *state_list;} stm;    
00039   } val; 
00040 } STATEMACHINE;

00065 typedef struct DECLARATION {

00068   union {
00069     struct {char *id1; char *id2; struct OPT_FILTER *opt_filter; struct OPT_SIM *opt_sim;} inputD;

00075   } val;
00076 } DECLARATION;

00174 typedef struct EXP {
00175   int lineno;
00176   enum {termK,orK,andK,plusK,minusK\
00177         ,timesK,divK,equalK,not_equalK,larger_thanK\
00178         ,larger_than_equalK,smaller_thanK,smaller_than_equalK} kind;
00179   union {
00180     struct {struct TERM *term;} termE;
00181     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} orE;
00182     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} andE;
00183     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} plusE;
00184     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} minusE;
00185     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} timesE;
00186     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} divE;
00187     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} equalE;
00188     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} not_equalE;
00189     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} larger_thanE;
00190     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} larger_than_equalE;
00191     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} smaller_thanE;
00192     struct {struct EXP *left; struct EXP *right;} smaller_than_equalE;
00193   } val;
00194 } EXP;
